import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Grid, Paper, Typography, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; const Home = () => { const [pageNav, setPageNav] = useState({ signUp: false }) const [userAuth, setUserAuth] = useState({ authed: false }) const submitLogin = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); setPageNav({ signUp: false }) setUserAuth({ authed: true }) } if (!pageNav.signUp) return (
Log In
Email Password
) return (
Sign Up!
Name Email Password Confirm Password
) } export default Home;
